name: TheJames.Church
tagline: Hi. My Name is James Church.
body:
# Welcome

My name is James Church and I'm an [assistant professor of computer science](http://cs.westga.edu/jameschurch) at [The University of West Georgia](http://westga.edu). My hobbies include camping, hiking, board games, table top RPGs, and video games. I enjoy traveling with my fianc√©e Michelle.

![James and Michelle in Birmingham, AL](pagesimages/james_michelle_birmingham.jpg)

![James and Michelle in Colliervill, TN](pagesimages/michell_james_collierville.jpg)

![James and Michelle play a boardgame](pagesimages/james_michell_boardgames.jpg)

![James' Family](pagesimages/james_family_graduation.jpg)

![James and Dr. Yixin Chen at the University of Mississippi](pagesimages/james_yixin_csdept.jpg)

![James and Michelle enjoy DragonCon](pagesimages/michell_james_princess_dragoncon.jpg)

![James and Peaches](pagesimages/james_peaches_martin.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
